Counsellor Manners, his last legacy to his son enriched and embellished with grave adviso's, pat histories, and ingenious proverbs, apologues, and apophthegms / by Josiah Dare. Dare, Josiah, 17th cent.
[5], 156, [2] p.
Printed for Edward Gough and are to be sold by most booksellers in London, London : 1673.
"Licensed, October 26, 1672, R.L."--colophon. Errata: p. [157] Reproduction of original in the Bristol Public Library.
